root_cause: High disk latency on /dev/sda1 caused by high I/O wait, leading to potential service outage.
recommendation_text: Monitor and optimize disk I/O wait by adjusting the I/O scheduler or adding more storage resources.

decision.why: Filtered by incident_type/service; ranked by similarity+priority

job.name: Clean Disk Space
job.description: Clean disk space by deleting temporary files, clearing log files, and vacuuming system journal to free up storage when disk usage is high or server is running out of space.
